title: KPU welcomes new gender-inclusive washrooms for students, staff (Kwantlen Polytechnic University)
text: ( Source : Kwantlen Polytechnic University ) Metro Vancouver , B.C. - Kwantlen Polytechnic University ( KPU ) students arrived for the fall semester to find new gender-inclusive washrooms on all four campuses. Nine men's and women's washrooms in
